name: Jog in the Fog
description:
This game was made for Cal Poly Pomona's 2022 Halloween game jam in accordance to the theme "Lost." Created in 48 hours.

You are in a foggy field with only a couple of flares and some moths to guide you to the light.

There are also a few not-so-friendly visitors lurking in the mist.

Collect as many fireflies as you can and do your best to survive.
